Coming Soon To A Courtroom Near You

31 Jan 2000

Those of you not from Portland might be interested in reading Copyright and Wrong, about the recent issues that have been taken to court by the RIAA and MPAA.

\n

While this article says nothing that we as Webmasters aren't already aware of, I thought I'd mention it by virtue of the fact that it never hurts to know what "they" (e.g. mainstream media) are saying about us and our work.
